jobDescription: ResponsibilitiesRadiant Solutions has an immediate opening in our McLean, VA location for a Geospatial Data Hunter/Targeting Specialist!  This is a full-time customer-site position providing support to a US Government agency.  This position will support the querying and structuring of data for use in complex and advanced analysis methods. The successful candidate will operate in a fast-paced dynamic environment. To be qualified, candidate MUST be a US Citizen and have an ACTIVE TS/SCI Clearance with Polygraph.Qualifications Knowledge of available government furnished information sources as well as available sources from industry, academia, the Intelligence Community (IC), the Military, and the scientific community.Ability to incorporate targeting best practices into a geospatial workflowStrong communication skills and the ability to forge relationships with data providersProactively seek out new data sourcesExperience discovering, requesting, downloading, and reformatting IC and external geospatial dataExperience organizing and formatting data into Esri file geodatabases, raster catalogs, and database formats specified by the customerExperience geocoding structured and unstructured dataExperience using ArcGISKnowledge of best practices for data standards, data management, data qualityDesired Skills:Experience with Postgres/PostGIS, or willingness to learnAbility to query data via APIs through SQL or PythonFamiliarity with open source geospatial toolsKnowledge of collection capabilities and tasking mechanismsExperience providing operational support for HUMINT and TECHINTUnderstanding of SIGINT systems and how to use within a GIS #cjpostOverviewJoin our company whose purpose is to help national security and commercial organizations understand and navigate our changing planet.
